forestr
  • Reference
  • Articles

Count individuals.

Count individuals.

abundance_n(x, group_by = c("quadrat", "sp"), only_alive = TRUE)

Arguments

x

Census.
group_by

Sting giving the variables to group by.
only_alive

If TRUE, filter only alive individuals.

Value

As per base::table().

See also

base::table().

Examples

stem <- forestr::bci12t7mini
(n <- abundance_n(stem))
#>        sp

abundance_n(stem, group_by = "sp", FALSE)
